Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Kn2-6 (BmKn2 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid deletion, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Cao L, Dai C, Li Z, Fan Z, Song Y, Wu Y, Cao Z, Li W.2012
Literature.Title: Antibacterial activity and mechanism of a scorpion venom peptide derivative in vitro and in vivo.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (69.23%) toparent peptide BmKn2I=R: 23%, L=F=K: 15%.Activity: active against E. coli AB94012 (MIC 100 ug/ml), S. aureus AB94004 (MIC 50 ug/ml).
